description: A heartwarming tale of Tom and his trusty stepladder, Steppy, overcoming everyday challenges.
title: Steppy Support
n_1: Tom struggles to reach a book on the high shelf, Steppy looks on.
n_2: Tom climbs Steppy, finally reaching the book.
n_3: Tom and Steppy share a peaceful moment, reading together.
n_4: Tom shares a light-hearted joke with Steppy.
c1_4: I have a stepladder because my real ladder left when I was just a kid.
c2_4: You've always had a step up in humor!
